column4: Accounts which are at least two weeks old and which were last used less than two hours after their creation are also considered to be expired.
When you log in IRC client, you need to type in password. There are many clients that allow you to do this automatically. I guess you didn't set that one up.
: i also sign in with password while startiningXchat
it doesnt ask me about password while sign in the channel. WHY?
